title: Protests May Await Redskins When They Land In Minn. For Vikings Game
teaser: The owners of Washington, D.C.'s NFL franchise are facing what could be the largest protest yet against their team's name. The team plays the Vikings on Sunday in Minnesota â€” a state with more than 100,000 people who claim Native American ancestry.
